SHARE PRINT Facebook Twitter Delicious StumbleUpon Home > Travel Guides > United States > District of Columbia > Washington > Washington Restaurants > Five Guys Washington OVERVIEW HOTELS VACATION RENTALS THINGS TO DO RESTAURANTS TRIP PLANS MAP DEALS
Five Guys , Washington 808 H St Nw, Washington, DC 20001 AVERAGE USER RATING Cuisine: American Restaurants Contact: (202) 393-2900 Open Hours: Sun: 11:00AM - 10:00PM, Mon: 11:00AM - 10:00PM, Tue: 11:00AM - 10:00PM, Wed: 11:00AM - 10:00PM, Fri: 11:00AM - 12:00AM, Sat: 11:00AM - 12:00AM Visit Website View more information on Yahoo! Local The food at Five Guys has been praised far and wide stalking numerous awards and prizes all the same. This Chinatown outlet is one of seven in DC ... More Five Guys Description The food at Five Guys has been praised far and wide stalking numerous awards and prizes all the same. This Chinatown outlet is one of seven in DC alone, such is the roaring success of their scarce offerings. Burgers, fries and hot-dogs dominate their menu with free refills of Coke coming at a premium. For a humble price, the quantities are very generous with large meals satisfying upto 3 persons. Bacon burgers and Cajun fries are considered definite bargains. The Chinatown outlet is priced a tad more for its increased demand. User Reviews Reviews for Five Guys: 797 AVERAGE OVERALL RATING Showing 1 - 10 of 797 Previous | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | Next Sort By: Most Recent Positive Negative Most Helpful USER RATING By Victor , 8/14/10 I refused my order at 5 guys when the guy who put the hamburgers on the grill, (handling raw meat) when ahead and also got the bun and other ingredients for my burgers, this is good example on how to get food poisoning. Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 7/19/10 I am in LA right now, and I keep telling all these dumb californians how much better five guys is than In-N-Out. They have never even heard of it. Shame on them, its the best fast food burger out there. Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/21/10 One of the best burgers (if you like greasy food) you can find in DC. Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/21/10 bags of potatoes surround you (to make french fries), peanuts on the table. It is a burger place and for fast food" it is above average Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/21/10 For a fast food restaurant, burgers here are a thing of beauty. Juicy, flavorful and freshly made. If you love fries, your in for a delightful surprise, a regular order easily serves two with leftovers. Eating in is your best option as food does not travel well. The fries wilt, the burger and bun shrink. The atmosphere is bare bones but who's looking at the walls? Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/21/10 Best grilled hamburgers with every imaginable fixin or extra in the area. Freshly made french fries. Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/20/10 the place to go to promote cardiac disease Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/20/10 How can you go wrong when you can get a good burger with all the free toppings you want? You can't, but the colossal french fires are even better than the burgers. Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/20/10 Fabulous burgers made to order. Place isn't fancy and don't expect much in the way of service...but you will enjoy the burgers. Was this review helpful? ( Yes — No ) Report a problem USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 2/20/10 Great burgers cooked any way you want it with endless choices for toppings. They have the best fries - fresh and always hot. They give you a generous portion of fries served in a brown bag. Half of the fries always disappear before my husband gets home with them! Was this review helpful?
